field.name: Share
field.definition: a boolean value that indicates whether a contributor's name, email address and organization is shared in systems and services

levelAndDeftn.levelDeftn: a boolean value that indicates whether a contributor's name, email address and organization is shared in systems and services

terms.termAndDeftn: yes, the name, email address and organization of the contributor can be shared or exposed in systems and services
no, the name, email address and organization of the contributor cannot be shared or exposed in systems and services

dos.practice: Choose True to indicate that it is okay to use a contributor's name, email address and organization in systems and services.
Choose False to indicate that it is not okay to use a contributor's name, email address and organization in systems and services.

documentation.domain: controlled vocabulary with an XML schema defined default value of false

notes.note: This field is an attribute of the contributor field.
